snippet.title: BEAM - OUT NOW - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
In Beam you are the captain of a large cargo spaceship that crashed into a strange rift. In your escape pod, your MARBLE, you have to solve physic puzzles in a dynamic 2.5D environment with a unique game mechanic to interact with light beams. Use the different behaviors of five light emitting crystals to overcome challenging situations to get back to safety and find out what has happened to your ship and what is the secret behind these mysterious crystals.

Support us and get Beam on Steam  ► http://bit.ly/BeamOnSteam
